# The .NET Compiler Platform SDK (Roslyn APIs)

> Documentation for The .NET Compiler Platform SDK (Roslyn APIs).

*Topics available: 11*

- [Choosing diagnostic IDs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/choosing-diagnostic-ids.md): This overview provides an understanding of how to choose a diagnostic ID
- [.NET Compiler Platform SDK concepts and object model](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/compiler-api-model.md): This overview provides the background you need to work effectively with the .NET compiler SDK. You'll learn the API layers, the major types involved, and the overall object model.
- [The .NET Compiler Platform SDK (Roslyn APIs)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/index.md): Learn to use the .NET Compiler Platform SDK (also called the Roslyn APIs) to understand .NET code, spot errors, and fix those errors.
- [Explore code with the Roslyn syntax visualizer in Visual Studio](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/syntax-visualizer.md): The syntax visualizer provides a visual tool to explore the models the .NET Compiler Platform SDK generates for code.
- [Work with the .NET Compiler Platform SDK semantic model](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/work-with-semantics.md): This overview provides an understanding of the type you use to understand and manipulate the semantic model of your code.
- [Use the .NET Compiler Platform SDK syntax model](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/work-with-syntax.md): This overview provides an understanding of the types you use to understand and manipulate syntax nodes.
- [Work with the .NET Compiler Platform SDK workspace model](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/work-with-workspace.md): This overview provides an understanding of the type you use to query and manipulate the workspace and projects for your code.

## Subtopics

- [Get Started Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/get-started/llms.txt): Topics available: 3; Get Started Docs documentation and reference.
- [Tutorials Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/tutorials/llms.txt): Topics available: 1; Tutorials Docs documentation and reference.
